comment: With any lab class, skipping more than 1 is setting you up for failure. Be sure to come in prepared because she gets right to business. She's amendable to anything you might need, so don't be afraid to ask her things! Very nice and most approachable professor I had last semester.
There's a lot of work just like any chemistry class but Professor Desmond is incredibly sweet and always helpful and ready to explain concepts further when asked. Would definitely take her again!

She is amazing! If you need help just ask and she's there. She loves what she does and will talk to you about anything you want. She knows her stuff. If I could take her for another class I would in a heartbeat.

She grades every number in every calculation to the "T" and that adds up fast. But she WILL explain anything you do not understand. Not an "easy A' but if you read up and pay attention and you will do fine.
She is extremely helpful! Took her for Chem Lab. She really goes out of her way to help people who are interested. She is very by the book though!! Quizzes before every lab class!!!
